entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 5:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -10.5°C
Wind: S 22 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
